description: Wolves: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title: Wolves: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title_page: Wolves: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Wolves in before the big kick-off on Monday, 14 August?
Our BBC Radio WM expert Mike Taylor is on hand with all his thoughts on the goings-on at Molineux and he's ready to answer your questions.
